css: @-moz-document domain("forum.chupa-mos.com") { .attachment a:hover { background-color:#dff1ff!important; border-color:#316ac5!important;}.cke_editor .cke_button a:hover,.cke_skin_kama .cke_editor a.cke_on:active{background-color:#86caff!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_wrapper.cke_ltr,.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_tabs a.cke_dialog_tab{background-color:#d1d1d1!important;color:#000!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_body .cke_dialog_tabs a.cke_dialog_tab_selected{background-color:#e4e4e4!important;color:#000!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_body .cke_dialog_tabs a.cke_dialog_tab:hover{background-color:#e1e1e1!important;color:#000!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_body .cke_dialog_title{border-bottom:1px solid #e4e4e4!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_body .cke_dialog_close_button span{border:1px solid #000!important;color:#000!important;}.cke_skin_kama .cke_dialog_body .cke_dialog_close_button div.cke_disabled .cke_dialog_ui_labeled_content *{background-color:#ccc!important;}.popupbody{background:none repeat-x scroll 0 0 #0f0f0f!important;border:1px solid #1c1c1c!important;color:#3e3e3e!important;}.popupbody li{border-top:1px solid #0f0f0f!important;}.popupbody li a,.popupbody li label{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 0 0 #0f0f0f!important;}.memberaction_body.popupbody{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 #1c1c1c!important;box-shadow:0 4px 7px #c8c8c8!important;}html{background:none repeat scroll 0 0 20px!important;}.blockhead{background:none repeat-x scroll 0 0 #333!important;border:1px solid #1c1c1c!important;color:#bababa!important;}.blocksubhead{background:none repeat-x scroll 0 0
